author: CBC News
title: Russian troops close in on Kyiv's centre as residents take shelter | CBC News
description: Russian forces launched co-ordinated missile and artillery attacks on Ukrainian cities on Saturday including the capital, Kyiv, where gunfire erupted near government buildings in the city centre, military officials and a Reuters witness said.
content:
